content.rendered:
The University of La Verne’s Burbank campus has served adult learners for more than 30 years, addressing the needs of working professionals and non-traditional students throughout the greater Los Angeles area.

Degree Programs for Adult Learners

If you are looking to complete your bachelor’s degree or take the next step in your career with a master’s degree, the Burbank Campus offers flexible schedules that allow you to work full time as you complete your coursework, usually one to two classes per session. A cohort model creates an atmosphere of support with professors and peers that helps you build professional connections, and personal attention from University of La Verne staff means there is always someone to speak with if you need it.

Programs in Burbank

Undergraduate Degree Programs

  • Accounting, BA
  • Business Administration, BA
  • Educational Studies, BA
  • Organizational Management, BS

Graduate Programs

  • Business Administration, MBA
  • Educational Counseling, MS with PPS Credential
  • Leadership and Management, MS
